00025 #ifndef EOS_KERNEL_LUA_THIS_RESTORER_H
00026 #define EOS_KERNEL_LUA_THIS_RESTORER_H
00027 
00028 #include "EOSLuaEnvironment.h"
00029 
00033 class EOSLuaThisRestorer
00034     {
00035     public:
00036         EOSLuaThisRestorer(EOSLuaEnvironment* luaEnv, int thisRef) : oldThisRef (0), luaEnv (luaEnv)
00037             {
00038             lua_State* luaState = luaEnv->getLuaState();
00039             if(luaEnv->isOk())
00040                 {
00041                 // Save the old "this" table
00042                 lua_getglobal(luaState, "this");
00043                 oldThisRef = luaL_ref(luaState, LUA_REGISTRYINDEX);
00044 
00045                 // replace it with our new one
00046                 lua_rawgeti(luaState, LUA_REGISTRYINDEX, thisRef);
00047                 lua_setglobal(luaState, "this");
00048                 }
00049             }
00050 
00051     virtual ~EOSLuaThisRestorer()
00052         {
00053         lua_State* luaState = luaEnv->getLuaState();
00054         if(oldThisRef != 0 && luaEnv->isOk())
00055             {
00056             // Replace the old "this" table
00057             lua_rawgeti(luaState, LUA_REGISTRYINDEX, oldThisRef);
00058             lua_setglobal(luaState, "this");
00059             luaL_unref(luaState, LUA_REGISTRYINDEX, oldThisRef);
00060             }
00061         }
00062 
00063     protected:
00064         int oldThisRef;
00065         EOSLuaEnvironment* luaEnv;
00066     };
00067 
00068 #endif
